title: Verify blue notifications automatically dismiss after 7 seconds
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has performed an action that causes a blue notification to appear
custom_steps: WHEN that notification has been on-screen for 7 seconds
custom_expected: IT is automatically dismissed

title: Verify notifications dismiss if you navigate to another page or tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has performed some action that causes a blue notification to appear
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to another tab or page
custom_expected: THEN the notification is dismissed

title: Verify the Add C widget has an Org header filter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
AND user can view the multi c widget
custom_expected: THEN the widget has an Org header filter

title: Verify the Org header filter defaults to the first Org on the list(NO LONGER RELEVANT)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
AND that user can view the multi c widget
custom_expected: THEN the Org header filter defaults to the first Org on the list

title: Verify all Orgs in the header are arranged in alphabetical order
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user views the Orgs in the header
custom_expected: THEN they are arranged alphabetically

title: Verify the BOC widget is only available when logged in as BOC
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as someone other than BOC
custom_expected: THEN the widget is not viewable

title: Verify that 'All' option is available in the Org filter
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Org filter in the BOC widget
custom_expected:
THEN the option 'All' is available in the Org filter
AND this is the first option of the filter, but it is not the default

title: Verify that 'All' shows Add Cs from all clubs
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
AND user is viewing the Org filter list in the Add C widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'All'
custom_expected:
THEN the widget shows all Add Cs from all clubs
AND any other filters used are intact

title: Verify that loading time does not exceed one minute
Verify that once BOC selects an Org from the header, Club filter updates
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user selects an Org from the header filter of the Add C widget
custom_expected: THEN the Club filter updates automatically with a list of clubs for that selected org

title: Verify that clubs are active
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is BOC and has selected an Org filter
custom_steps: WHEN user views the Club filter
custom_expected: THEN the clubs are all active

title: Verify that clubs must be arranged in order of LOP
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user selects an Org from the filter on the Add C widget
custom_expected: THEN the clubs in the Club filter are arranged by level of play

title: Verify that the dropdown defaults to 'All'
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC 
AND has selected an Org filter on the Add C widget
custom_expected: THEN the Club dropdown filter defaults to 'All'

title: Verify that 'All' is first option on the list
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND has selected an Org filter on the Add C widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Club dropdown filter
custom_expected: THEN 'All' is the first option

title: Verify that selecting a club filters results to show players on that club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND has selected an Org filter on the Add C widget
custom_steps: WHEN the selects an item from the Club dropdown filter
custom_expected: THEN the population of the widget is only players on the selected club

title: Verify that "Years Left" column is between "Club" and "Date Signed"
Verify that "Status" filter is available from filter dropdown
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND is viewing the Add C widget
custom_expected: THEN the user can select "Status" as a filter type from the widget filter menu

title: Verify that Filter allows for multi-select
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND can view the Add C widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the "Status" filter dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the user can multi-select options
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=global___custom_filters

title: Verify that "Status" filter shows correct statuses
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND has applied a "Status" filter to the Add C widget
custom_expected: THEN the results will be filtered correctly

title: Verify that filter icon is added
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND has applied a "Status" filter to the Add C widget
custom_expected: THEN a filter indicator will be added to the "filter" icon

title: Verify that "Not Created" is a seperate option
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND user is viewing filter options in the Add C widget
custom_expected: THEN "Not Created" and "Preliminary" are two different options for status filters

title: Verify that if "Date Signed" (player signed) field left blank, hard error appears
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND has checked off some Add C's for approval
AND some of those Add C's has the "Date Signed" field left blank
custom_steps: WHEN user submits for approval
custom_expected: THEN hard error shows

title: Verify error framework
custom_expected: http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=errors_returned

title: Verify that Rule 19.14 has Overridable error for BOC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
AND that there exists an Add-C that violates the rule, "The date signed field must be after the system date 'Rule 5 draft' of the previous year of the Addendum Cs. Ex, if the title shows 2016, then signing date must be after Rule 5 draft date in 2015."
custom_steps: WHEN the user approves this Add-C
custom_expected: THEN the resulting warning is overridable

title: Verify that Rule 19.2 has Overridable error for BOC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
AND there is an Add-C that violates the rule https://www.pivotaltracker.com/projects/1402858/stories/105346582
"A Salary must be entered in the Amount Column for the Player's current level of Play. Otherwise show hard error with BOC over ride"
custom_steps: WHEN user approves the above Add-C
custom_expected: THEN user will see an overridable warning stating "A Salary must be entered in the Amount Column for the Player's current level of Play"

title: Verify that Rule 19.7 has Overridable error for BOC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND that there is an Add C that violates https://www.pivotaltracker.com/projects/1402858/stories/105346582
"For all subsequent C's and subsequent contracts, the salaries entered for levels AAA, AA, A, SA, RA and R must be equal to or Higher than the salary entered for their first Addendum C for their first contract."
custom_steps: WHEN user approves that Add C
custom_expected:
THEN an overridable warning appears
"For all subsequent C's and subsequent contracts, the salaries entered for levels AAA, AA, A, SA, RA and R must be equal to or Higher than the salary entered for their first Addendum C for their first contract."

title: Verify that Rule 19.9 has Overridable error for BOC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND there is an Add C that violates the rule "For all subsequent C's and subsequent contracts, the salaries entered for levels AAA, AA, A, SA, RA and R must be equal to or Higher than the salary entered for their first Addendum C for their first contract."
custom_steps: WHEN user approves that Add-C
custom_expected: THEN user sees message "For all subsequent C's and subsequent contracts, the salaries entered for levels AAA, AA, A, SA, RA and R must be equal to or Higher than the salary entered for their first Addendum C for their first contract."

title: Verify that Rule 19.10 has Overridable error for BOC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND there is an Add C that violates "For Non-First year, contracts, salary must be Equal to or Higher than $500 for ASL, DSL, VSL"
custom_steps: WHEN user approves that Add-C
custom_expected: THEN there is an overridable warning that states "For Non-First year, contracts, salary must be Equal to or Higher than $500 for ASL, DSL, VSL"

title: Verify that Rule 19.11 has Overridable error for BOC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND there is an Add C that violates "A salary for a particular level of play should not be cut by more than 20% of the most recent Approved Addendum C salary for the same level of play - ignoring any empty values"
custom_steps: WHEN user approves that Add C
custom_expected: THEN there is an overridable warning

title: Verify that Rule 19.12 has Overridable error for BOC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND there is an Add C that violates the rule "Ignoring all blank and zero values,  salary for each level of play in the Addendum C must not be lower than the equivalent value in the MJ contract divided by 12."
custom_steps: WHEN user approves that Add C
custom_expected: THEN there will be an overridable warning that reads "Ignoring all blank and zero values,  salary for each level of play in the Addendum C must not be lower than the equivalent value in the MJ contract divided by 12."

title: Verify that Rule 19.13 has Overridable error for BOC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND there is an Add C that triggers the warning: "Ignoring all blank and zero values,  if salary for each level of play in the Addendum C is higher than the equivalent value in the MJ contract divided by 12. For each level of play that is higher, show soft error"
custom_steps: When user attempts to approve that Add C
custom_expected: THEN they see and overridable warning "The salary for level of play [level of play] is higher than the Player's monthly Paragraph 2 salary in his Major league contract [MJ salary/12]"

title: Verify that Rule 19.20 has Overridable error for BOC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND there exists and Add C in Submitted state without an attachment
custom_steps: WHEN user approves that Add C
custom_expected: THEN they see and overridable warning "You must attach the signed Addendum C"

title: Add a flag column
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the BOC widget
custom_expected: THEN there is a flag column to the right of the attachments column and to the left of the Club column

title: Verify flags present
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into BOC
AND Checks the Addendum C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User checks flag column
AND Checks a addendum C Submitted with issues
custom_expected:
THEN Flag should appear for that addendum C
AND have details of the issue on the addendum C

title: Verify blue flag icon appears in column title - Global
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into BOC
AND Checks the Addendum C widget
custom_steps: WHEN User checks column title
custom_expected: THEN blue flag icon is on the column title

title: Verify when flag title icon is clicked flag column brings all flags to the top of the addendum C widget - Global
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into BOC
AND Checks the Addendum C widget
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks the flag icon column
custom_expected: THEN All addendum C's should be brought to the top of the widget that have a flag.

title: Verify When clicking a flag, popup should appear showing the flags of the addendum C - Global
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into BOC
AND Checks the Addendum C widget
AND Finds a addendum c with a flag
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks on flag
custom_expected: THEN A popup should appear with all the flags that the addendum C has.

title: Verify that when a pending addendum C has been cut by more than 20%, a flag appears for only the levels of play that are affected.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into BOC
AND User is looking at addendum C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks Enter Salary
AND Clicks Previous Salary
AND Enters 20% less than previous salary for multiple levels of play
AND Send addendum C to pending status
custom_expected: THEN Addendum C should have a flag that states that the certain levels of play that have been cut more than 20% appears.

title: Verify BOC can edit all rows and all fields not in approved status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into BOC
AND Views addendum C widget
AND Addendum C is not in approved status
custom_steps: WHEN BOC clicks edit pencil
custom_expected: THEN All columns of the selected addendum C are editable

title: Verify BOC can save changes to any unapproved addendum C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into BOC
AND Views addendum C widget
AND Addendum C is not in approved status
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC clicks edit pencil on a addendum C
AND Edits a addendum C
AND Clicks save
custom_expected: THEN any changes made are saved.

title: Verify that any level of play over $25,000 has a flag
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
AND User is on the addendum C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN Addendum C pencil is clicked
AND Value of some of the addendum C's are changed to greater than 25,000
AND User submits addendum C to Pending Status
custom_expected: THEN Flag will appear that shows all levels of play greater than 25,000

title: Verify "Addendum C auto-approval" system date is added with "Start" and "End" dates
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into Systemadmin
AND User goes to System admin on left navigation
custom_steps: WHEN User checks system dates
custom_expected: THEN "Addendum C auto-approval" should be present on system dates with "Start" and "End" date boxes on the same line.

title: Verify The date range should appear after the system date "Addendum C defaults to next year"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into system admin
AND User goes to system admin on left navigation
custom_steps: WHEN User finds "Addendum C defaults to next year"
custom_expected: THEN " Addendum C auto-approval" system date should appear right after

title: Verify The date range should be editable and saved like other dates
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged System Admin
AND Goes to system admin on the left navigation
custom_steps:
WHEN User finds "Addendum C auto-approval" 
AND edits the dates
AND Clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum C's out of this range should not be auto-approved
AND the date entering is similar to other system dates

title: Verify that BOC has the ability to split a PDF into individual 1 page PDFs
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into BOC
AND User goes to the addendum C widget

title: Verify the individual PDFS should be downloadble by the BOC as a single zip file
Verify File browser should only allow user to select .pdf files
Verify that splitting PDFs flow matches wireframe
custom_preconds: http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=pdf_splitter

title: Verify that in any state except "Not Created" and "Approved" activates Approve button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into BOC
AND Viewing addendum C widget
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks checkbox on any status besides Not Created and Approved
custom_expected: THEN the Approve button activates and is clickable.

title: Verify hitting the approve button moves addendum C to Approved state
custom_preconds:
GIVEN That User is logged in as BOC
AND is viewing addendum c widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks checkbox on a addendum C that is not in "Not Created" or "Approved" state
AND Clicks Approve
custom_expected: THEN Addendum C moves to approved state

title: Verify that once addendum c is approved, it turns to a black font
custom_preconds:
GIVEN That User is logged in as BOC
AND is viewing addendum c widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User selects checkbox of a "Not Created" or "Approved" Addendum C
AND Clicks Approve
custom_expected: THEN Addendum C on widget turns black when it turns approved.

title: Verify that a blue notification that shows "[X] Addendum C[s] were successfully approved"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN That User is logged in as BOC
AND is viewing addendum c widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User selects a checkbox of a addendum c that isn't "Not created" or "Approved"
AND Clicks Approve
custom_expected: THEN Blue notification appears that says "[X] Addendum C[s] were successfully approved"

title: Verify that upload icon is always enabled for addendum C's without an attachment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
AND Views the Addendum C widget
custom_steps: WHEN User goes to a addendum C without a attachment
custom_expected: THEN a clickable Upload arrow appears in the attachment column

title: Verify BOC can upload a attachment in preliminary,tendered,pending or approved state
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
AND Views the Addendum C widget
AND Finds a addendum c in Preliminary,Tendered,Pending or Approved State without a attachment
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks upload arrow
AND Selects a file to upload
custom_expected: THEN File is uploaded to addendum C

title: Verify When an addendum C is e-signed and approved, A BOC stamp is included at the bottom of the pdf
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into BOC
AND User looks for Tendered Addendum Cs
AND sends Addendum C to esign
AND Addendum C is esigned
custom_steps: WHEN BOC checks Uploaded Addendum C from esign
custom_expected: THEN Show BOC stamp at bottom of page that includes "For Commissioners office use only", "Approved and recorded", "By commissioner of Baseball" and the signature "Roy Krasik "designee"

title: Verify that the date of approval must be recorded in the date field
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into BOC
AND Checks Addendum C widget

*E-signed workflow only works currently
custom_steps: WHEN User checks Addendum C attachment thats already approved
custom_expected: THEN Date of approval appears on Addendum C attachment

title: Verify when opening a PDF with a paperclip icon on a Approved Add C must show and print stamp
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
AND User is viewing addendum C widget
AND Addendum C is already approved and has a attachment

*E-signature workflow is the only working workflow currently.
custom_steps: WHEN User checks approved addendum C's attachment
custom_expected:
THEN The attachment icon looks like a paperclip
AND The stamp appears on the attachment

title: Verify If date signed on Addendum C is outside the Add C auto-approval system date, show flag
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
AND User is viewing Addendum C widget
AND Knows the Add C auto-approval system date
custom_steps: WHEN User sets date signed outside of the date of the Add C auto-approval system date
custom_expected: THEN Show a flag that says "Addendum C submitted after auto-approval cut off"

title: Verify If date signed is in the auto-approval system date, show no flag.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
AND User is viewing Addendum C widget
AND Knows the Add C auto-approval system date
custom_steps: WHEN User sets date signed inside of the date of the Add C auto-approval system date
custom_expected: THEN Addendum C should be auto-approved.

title: Verify When BOC saves a form with an e-signed attachment, it prompts a warning message
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
AND Goes to addendum C widget
AND Finds a e-signed addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN User opens addendum C
AND Clicks edit
AND Makes changes
AND Clicks save
custom_expected: THEN A warning message appears warning user that data will not be consistent with PDF

title: Verify That it does not prevent BOC from editing the form and only appears on save
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
AND Goes to addendum C widget
AND Finds a e-signed addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks on edit
AND Makes changes
AND Clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN Warning appears on save. It should not appear prior to save.

title: Verify That if cancel is hit, changes are not saved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
AND Goes to addendum C widget
AND Finds a e-signed addendum C
custom_steps:
AND User clicks on edit
AND Makes changes
AND Clicks Cancel
custom_expected: THEN All data that was changed is reverted and no changes were saved

title: Verify that if user hits ignore and continue, it saves the users changes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
AND Goes to addendum C widget
AND Finds a e-signed addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks edit on form
AND Makes changes
AND Clicks Save
AND Clicks ignore and continue
custom_expected: THEN the changes are saved to the form.

title: Verify When BOC saves a form that is currently being e-signed, they receive a warning message
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
AND Goes to addendum C widget
AND Finds a addendum C being currently e-signed
custom_steps:
WHEN User finds a addendum C that is currently being e-signed
AND Clicks edit 
AND Makes changes
AND Clicks save
custom_expected: THEN User receives a warning message that the addendum C is currently being e-signed

title: Verify that the error only appears on hitting the save button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
AND Goes to addendum C widget
AND Finds a addendum C being currently e-signed
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks edit
AND Makes changes
AND Clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN Warning message pops up, warning should not appear prior to clicking save.

title: Verify if there are multiple rows on the multi-c widget being saved then show a warning for each player that triggers the error
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
AND Goes to addendum C widget
AND Finds a addendum C being currently e-signed
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks checkbox on multiple addendum C's that are currently being e-signed
AND Clicks edit
AND Makes changes
AND Clicks save
custom_expected: THEN A Warning message should appear for every player that is currently being e-signed

title: Verify if user hits cancel that they do not save changes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
AND Goes to addendum C widget
AND Finds a addendum C being currently e-signed
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks edit
AND Makes Changes
AND Clicks cancel
custom_expected: THEN All changes should revert and no changes should be saved.

title: Verify if user hits ignore and continue then save the user's changes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
AND Goes to addendum C widget
AND Finds a addendum C being currently e-signed
custom_steps:
WHEN User hits edit
AND Makes changes
AND Clicks Save
AND Clicks ignore and continue
custom_expected: THEN All changes made to addendum c would be saved.

title: Verify that if a player has an active Major Contract without a para 2 salary, show flag
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into BOC
AND goes to addendum C widget
AND finds player with a active Major Contract without a paragraph 2 salary
*Create a minor league player with a Major Contract and without a minor league compensation clause
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks edit on addendum C
AND Submits Addendum C to Pending
custom_expected: THEN A flag is shown that player has a Major Contract without a paragraph 2 salary.

title: Verify that if a player has an active Major contract with a para 2 salary for current level of play, show flag
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into BOC
AND goes to addendum C widget
AND finds player with a active Major Contract with a paragraph 2 salary
*Create a minor league player with a Major Contract and with a minor league compensation clause
custom_steps:
WHEN User edits addendum C of player
AND Clicks Submit to Pending
custom_expected: THEN Flag is shown that player has a major league contract with a paragraph 2 salary
